bibl.title: Report on the Season in Firan-Sinaï (February-March 1995).
bibl.note: 1. Excavations in the southern court of the Town Church "Church of Sts. Kosmas and Damianos". - 2. Further investigations in the sanctuary. - 3. The discovery of a new small church. - 4. Investigations at the northern fortification wall. - 5. The preliminary ceramic report. - 6. The Greek inscription from the lintel of the south door of the Town Church (second half of the 6th century AD).
bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter, Michael JONES and Yiannis MEIMARIS, Report on the Season in Firan-Sinaï (February-March 1995).
BZ 91 (1998) pp. 345-358, 4 figg. et pll. I-III.

1. Excavations in the southern court of the Town Church "Church of Sts. Kosmas and Damianos". - 2. Further investigations in the sanctuary. - 3. The discovery of a new small church. - 4. Investigations at the northern fortification wall. - 5. The preliminary ceramic report. - 6. The Greek inscription from the lintel of the south door of the Town Church (second half of the 6th century AD).
